item.title: Background
item.description: The Unlocking Method Who We are the Chalmers students John Luc and Johnny Hamnesj√∂ taking a course in Mobile Computing. Where This is a prototype developed for the course CIU176 - Mobile Computing, design and implementation that’s given at the department of Computer Science and Engineering at Chalmers University of Technology and the University of Gothenburg. What The theme for this project is Authentication and Access, which means we are to design an innovative solution for the purpose of unlocking.
